title: Remove per-user last active status from admin analytics UI

requirements.summary: Remove all per-user “Last Active” UI and any frontend-only formatting helpers used exclusively for it.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin user analytics table no longer shows a "Last Active" column or any per-user last-active date/relative time.
No user-facing text anywhere in the app includes "Last Active" for an individual user.
Frontend builds successfully after removing/adjusting any imports/usages tied to per-user last active formatting (e.g., formatLastActiveDay if it becomes unused).

file_operations.description: Remove the per-user "Last Active" table column (header label and cell rendering) and eliminate sorting by the last-active field (e.g., remove 'issuedDay' from SortField and default sort). Also remove any imports/usages for last-active formatting helpers so the table displays only non-last-active per-user analytics.

Remove the per-user last-active formatting helper (e.g., formatLastActiveDay) if it becomes unused after updating the admin analytics table; ensure remaining exports (e.g., formatBigIntCount, formatCacheTimestamp) remain intact and that the frontend compiles without unused imports.
